rows.label: tlk001001_07_msg0001
rows.name:
Thank you...all of you. Not as emperor,
but as myself, as a person.

rows.label: tlk001001_07_msg0002
rows.name:
Thank you for taking Special
Inquisitor Meleph...

rows.label: tlk001001_07_msg0003
rows.name:
No... Thank you for taking my sister
with you on your journey.

rows.label: tlk001001_07_msg0004
rows.name:
I entrust the future of Alst to you.
And I hope you will continue to keep
my sister under your wing till the end.

rows.label: tlk001001_07_msg0005
rows.name:
Dear sister...
I'll take care of our country.

rows.label: tlk001001_07_msg0006
rows.name:
Go with the Holy Grail and Rex-san.
Help them save Alst.

rows.label: tlk001001_07_msg0007
rows.name:
When peace is finally restored,
I'd very much like to hear your
tales of adventure.
